Music of the Week 02 (Jan.5 - Jan.11, 2025)

Jan 9, 2026

This is a pilot, let’s all hope I could continue updating it.

A remix/jazzy version of that famous(and great) World Map BGM from the OG Final Fantasy VI

OG fyi:

The best World Map OST I’ve ever heard in an JRPG, albeit a post-collapse one.


Speaking of Final Fantasy VI, sure gonna fiddle with boring commutes with the amazing:

The final boss fight battle BGM, 17 mins long, amazingly composed and crazy.


What can I say? Simply amazing. Although I reckon the name will cause a bit of confusion when introducing it to new comers… especially those know how to read kanji.


Speaking of which:

zun 的小号吹得好~ zun 的小号吹得好~ zun 的小号吹的真好呐~~ zun 的小号吹得真好~~

by Troubadour Ggmz on THBWiki

Tranlation(in accurate but you get the gist of it): “This is the ZUNPet where and how, this the ZUNPet ri-ight now, ZUN really knows how to, to put the ZUNPet in the right placeeeeeeeee.”


Read this with 永遠の春夢 starting at 1:00


Simply amazing, part of the (my personal) PEAK namitape collection.


My whole week be like. I AM NOT MOTIVATED

Lght, that sums up for this week, you could also follows me on Apple Music lol
